- [Binding]2

translation:

- [Paralysis]1
- [Binding]2
<CMT_KR>
<CMT_JP>

- [AttackDown] 3
- [DefenseDown] 3
- [Paralysis] 1
- [Binding] 2
EN:
[EndSkill] Randomly inflict 2 of the following effects next turn. Dies after dealing 10 damage
- 3 [AttackDown]
- 3 [DefenseDown]
- 1 [Paralysis]
- 2 [Binding]

<CMT_JP>
translation:
[WhenUse] 失った体力10%につき、基本威力 +1 (最大5)
[WhenUse] 対象の[Burst]4につき、コイン威力 +1 (最大3)

[WhenUse] 対象の([Burst] + [Burst]回数)が10以上なら、対象の[Burst]回数だけ[Burst]回数が増加
<CMT_KR>

[WhenUse] 대상의 ([Burst] + [Burst] 횟수)가 10 이상이면, 대상의 [Burst] 횟수만큼 [Burst] 횟수 증가

[WhenUse] Base Power +1 for every 10% missing HP on self (max 5)
[WhenUse] Coin Power +1 for every 4 [Burst] on target (max 3)
